game_info.name: Zero Sievert Clone
game_info.description: Top-down extraction shooter set in post-apocalyptic wasteland. Venture from bunker into procedurally generated zones, scavenge loot, fight enemies, and extract before death. Permadeath loses equipped gear.

core_loop.description: Prepare loadout in bunker -> Travel to zone -> Explore and loot -> Fight enemies -> Reach extraction point -> Return to bunker with loot -> Sell/upgrade -> Repeat

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Mouse aims, left click fires weapon. WASD moves. Shift sprints, Space dodge rolls. E to loot containers. Reach extraction point (green zone) to complete raid.
